Name: ON-Harmony: A resource for development and comparison of multi-modal brain 3T MRI harmonisation approaches
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite this paper: Warrington, Ntata, et al. (2023) A resource for development and comparison of multimodal brain 3T MRI harmonisation approaches, Imaging Neuroscience, doi.org/10.1162/imag_a_00042
EthicsApprovals: For cohort B, all data have been acquired under University of Nottingham Research ethics FMHS-452-0122, also approved by University of Oxford Medical Sciences Research Ethics Committee (R79669/RE001).
For cohort A, Nottingham data: S.N.S. (PI) FMHS-36-1220-03 and H14082014/47. Oxford data: technical development approved by the Oxford University Clinical Trials and Research Governance office.
